direct_enhancements.reason: Both methods involve iterating over form elements and processing their attributes.
Both methods are related to preparing and handling form data for submission.
Both methods access and manipulate attributes of form elements.
Both methods involve selecting elements based on certain criteria, though for different purposes.
Both methods modify the state of the form by adding or processing elements.

enhanced_by.reason: The elements method provides the list of form elements needed to set up the formData method.
The attr method is used to access attributes of form elements, which is necessary for setting up the formData method.
The submit method is invoked after formData is prepared, indicating a state dependency.
The select method can be used to verify the form elements selected by the formData method.
The addElement method can be used to assert the state changes made by the formData method.
